Email.title: Email
Email.description: This is email address. It is collected from the user only if FulfillmentProvider is Heroku

ExternalID.title: ExternalID
ExternalID.description: This is ExternalID which is 15 or 18 char org ID. It is collected from the user only if FulfillmentProvider is force.com

FulfillmentProvider.title: FulfillmentProvider
FulfillmentProvider.description: Possible values are Force.com or Heroku. Other values are not supported.

TenantCustomName.title: TenantCustomName
TenantCustomName.description: Collect this from User. This is user friendly name of the Tenant.

accountId.title: accountId
accountId.description: This is account id for which tenant record needs to be created. Find this Id from the Context. Find the accountId by querying the Account object by name of the account.
